document.full_text: any old cobra can hiss, but the one that tweets on wednesday had more than 150,000 people following twitter posts about her escape from new york city's bronx zoo, including top politicians and celebrities.
document.title: missing bronx zoo cobra sparks twitter following
lines_and_colors: any old cobra can hiss, but the one that tweets on wednesday had more than 150,000 people following twitter posts about her escape from new york city's bronx zoo, including top politicians and celebrities.
